projects.title: Slab Leak Detection & Repair
projects.description: Detected and repaired a hidden slab leak using electronic leak detection. Saved the homeowner from foundation damage.

projects.title: Tankless Water Heater Install
projects.description: Replaced a traditional 50-gallon tank with a Rinnai tankless system. Endless hot water and 40% energy savings.

projects.title: Whole House Repipe
projects.description: Complete copper-to-PEX repipe of a 1970s home. Improved water pressure and eliminated galvanized pipe corrosion.

projects.title: Sewer Line Replacement
projects.description: Trenchless sewer line replacement using pipe bursting technology. Minimal yard disruption for the homeowner.

projects.title: Master Bath Remodel
projects.description: Complete plumbing rough-in for a luxury master bath remodel. Dual vanity, walk-in shower, and freestanding tub.

projects.title: Commercial Backflow Install
projects.description: Installed and certified backflow prevention devices for a restaurant complex. Full code compliance achieved.
